name: The Shades of Red
description:
The Shades of Red Demo - Now Available

The Shade of red is a romance/horror yandere visual novel were you meet Isaac Redfield.

A recently trending painter, who agreed to give you painting lessons.

Content Warning: strong language, suggestive themes, drug use, suicide, violence & blood
This game is intended for 18+ audiences.  The demo does not contain  adult content.
